attributes.title: Scientific Experiments on Kundalini Awakening by Nithyananda on Guru Purnima 15 July 2011
attributes.description:
http://innerawakening.org/
Experience Kundalini Awakening and Levitation - Inner Awakening

Get Mail alerts of our new videos SUBSCRIBE (Click on Subscribe link above video)

This video is a landmark video showing the effects of Kundalini Awakening, with scientifically proven brain wave patterns. Living enlightened master Paramahamsa Nithyananda first talks about Kundalini Awakening on the auspicious day of Guru Purnima and then the experiment showing the effects of Kundalini Awakening on the brain wave patterns is shown.
